title: Preloader
summary: The preloader utility (.u-preloader) adds a shimmer loading animation to components, providing visual feedback during asynchronous operations.

description.main: Apply .u-preloader to show a loading state on any element. The utility creates an animated shimmer effect and hides all child content until loading completes.

basic.title: Basic Preloader
basic.description: Apply the basic preloader to any element to show a loading state with a shimmer animation. All child elements will be hidden during the loading state.

.u-preloader.description: Adds a shimmer loading animation to the entire element and hides all children.

inner.title: Inner Component Preloader
inner.description: Target only specific inner components for loading states. This variant is useful when you want to show loading states for specific content-rich components while keeping the container and other elements visible.

.u-preloader--inner.description: Applies loading states to inner components only: .c-typography, .c-button, .c-avatar, .c-datebadge, .c-field, .c-option, and .c-select. The container remains visible while only meaningful content shows the shimmer effect.

opacity.title: Opacity Modifiers
opacity.description: Control the opacity of the preloader overlay to adjust its visual intensity.

.u-preloader__opacity--{1-10}.description: Sets the opacity of the preloader overlay (1 = 0.1, 10 = 1.0).
